## Vaccination Graph
```{r}
Vaccination_Across_Months_LL_2_ <- read_excel("Vaccination_Across_Months_LL (2).xlsx")
data2 <- Vaccination_Across_Months_LL_2_ 
data2$long <- as.numeric(data2$Long)
data2$lat <- as.numeric(data2$Lat) 
data.SP <- SpatialPointsDataFrame(data2[,c(5,6)], data2[,-c(5,6)]) 

m <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(data=data2, lng = ~Long, lat = ~Lat, popup = ~Fully_Vaccinated)
m
  
```
